TEST.comboBox_Tipo: QComboBox {font: normal 12pt Calibri; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); border-radius:8px; padding: 2px 0px 2px 10px;} QComboBox:on {background-color: rgb(220, 220, 220); border-top-right-radius: 8px; border-top-left-radius: 8px; border-bottom-right-radius: 0px; border-bottom-left-radius: 0px; padding: 2px 0px 2px 10px;} QComboBox::editable {background: navy; border-radius:0px;} QComboBox::drop-down {background: green; subcontrol-origin: padding; subcontrol-position: top right; width: 25px; border-left: 2px solid yellow; border-top-right-radius: 8px; border-bottom-right-radius: 8px;} QComboBox::drop-down:on {border-top-right-radius: 8px; border-bottom-right-radius: 0px;} QComboBox::down-arrow {image: url(images/cb_downarrow_w_01.png);} QComboBox QAbstractItemView {border: 0px solid red; background-color:darkseagreen; background-color:lightslategrey; selection-background-color: darkcyan; color:orange; selection-color:darkblue; font: italic bold 12pt Calibri; border-radius: 0px; min-width: 150px;} QListView::item:selected {color: magenta; background-color: lightgray; min-width: 1000px;} QScrollBar {background:rgb(15, 15, 15); border: 0px solid #999999; border-radius:6px; width:20px; height:20px; padding:5px;} QScrollBar::handle {background: rgb(82, 131, 16); border-radius:5px; min-height: 0px; min-width: 0px;} QScrollBar::sub-page {background: rgb(15, 15, 15); border-radius: 4px; width: 8px; height: 8px;} QScrollBar::add-page {background: rgb(15, 15, 15); border-radius:0px;} QScrollBar::add-line {background: green; height: 0px; subcontrol-position: bottom; subcontrol-origin: margin;} QScrollBar::sub-line {background: green; height: 0px; subcontrol-position: top; subcontrol-origin: margin;}
